title: Poster, "Checkmate, Ballet by Arthur Bliss", 1937
signed: Signed in blue gouache: E. Mcknight Kauffer
creditline: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
description: Poster design for Checkmate play against a black background. Upper margin, in white and red: CHECKMATE / [in white:] BALLET BY ARTHUR BLISS. A white wig-like design over black outline against a blue rectangle, a grid in white leads to another wig-like element in orange over a white outline against an amorphous gray shape. Text in white and outlined in black: ECHEC; below it, in white: ET MAT; lower right, in gray and white: SCHACHMATT; lower left in gray: NOVELLOW AND COMPANY LTD. LONDON.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, "Checkmate, Ballet by Arthur Bliss", 1937.
1937. Brush and gouache on paper. Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer. 1963-39-288.
